Unexpected Error occurred!
java.net.UnknownHostException: localhost
	at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source)
	at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source)
	at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
	at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.execution.client.core.NodeFactory.createNode(NodeFactory.java:71)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.execution.samples.SampleJVMTIClient.main(SampleJVMTIClient.java:67)

I've attached the sample JVMTI code that I'm using.

Sample JVMTI Client
Will check this - what vm are you using
I am lowering the severity on this one following the TI meeting - this is recreatable but bizarre - works with 127.0.01 and works on all other VMs and VM versions except for SUn 1506
